result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Erik Jacob Christensen

Status conference on September 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:31 PM Prosecuting attorney Kaley Walker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Erik Jacob Christensen appeared in custody via Zoom videoconferencing from PCJ.  Attorney Kaitlyn Dippolito appears via Zoom videoconferencing w/supervision of Atty. Travis Satorius. Includes Initial on 22CF105, Return on Warrant on 22CM40, 22CM44, 22CM47, 22CT56, 20CT59, 20CT59.  Court questions nonappearance..  State does not object to quashing warrants and reinstating bonds.  Court quashes warrants and reinstates bonds in 22CM40, 22CM44, 22CM47, 22CT56, 20CT59, 20CT59. Court questions Defendant's address, dob, phone.  Defendant states he still lives with RAB.  State willing to amend to no violent or abusive contact.
Status conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
DE in custody - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif

Atty Nelson appeared in court. 20CT56, 20CT58, 20CT59, 22CM40, and 22CM44 set for status. 22CF105 set for initial appearance. ADA Schieffer requests a warrant on each case. Nelson: no information on Defendant. Court orders statewide warrants on 20CT56, 20CT58, 20CT59, 22CM40, and 22CM44  and adjoining states on 22cf105.
Status conference on June 20, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
filed by Atty Joseph Schieffer. eif

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on April 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to possess or consume any alcohol.

3:03 PM Defendant Erik Jacob Christensen appears from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson, DA Halle E. Hatch appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CM40, 22CM44, 20CT59, 20CT58 and 20CT56 (RW). Court questions non-appearance, Def responds. Court will quash the warrants. DE does qualify for PD.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. NG on all Counts/Cases. DA Hatch is requesting a $1,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS & No possession of alcohol. Court. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:15 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
